list.title: BasicRenderer2D#add
list.description: adds a Object to {@link BasicRenderer2D|objs} array

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#convertHexToRGBA
list.description: Converts a hex color value to a RGBA color value

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#createGradient
list.description: Creates a linear gradient from the given array of colors

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#createRGBAColor
list.description: Creates a RGBA color from the given parameters

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#get
list.description: Returns a object from the {@link BasicRenderer2D|objs} array

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#loadImage
list.description: Gets the image data from local storage

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#remove
list.description: remove the object from the {@link BasicRenderer2D|objs} array

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#render
list.description: Renders all the objects in the Objects array

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#saveImage
list.description: Loads the image from the url and saves it to local storage.

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#setAlpha
list.description: Sets the alpha color of the {@link BasicRenderer2D|domElement}

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#setColor
list.description: Sets the background color of the {@link BasicRenderer2D|domElement}

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#setSize
list.description: Sets the size of the {@link BasicRenderer2D|canvasWidth} and {@link BasicRenderer2D|canvasHeight} values to the specified parameters

list.title: BasicRenderer2D#update
list.description: Updates all the objects in {@link BasicRenderer2D|objs} array

list.title: randomFloat
list.description: Returns a random float between min and max

list.title: randomInt
list.description: Returns a random integer between the specified range given
